about_the_game:
Earth, Fire, Air and Water - these elements are a staple in many RPG dungeons. Now you can bring the power of the elemental dungeon to your RPG Maker MV project with this fantastic new tileset pack.

Whether you're on the lookout for a classic explorer's dungeon or simply want a little extra variety for your RPG Maker MV maps, Elemental Dungeons Tiles is a must-have addition to your growing library of RPG Maker resources!

This pack includes:
- Animated A1 lava auto-tiles
- A2 floor auto-tiles
- A4 wall tiles
- Three A5 wall and floor tiles
- Complete Tile B, including decorations and architectural elements needed to create 4 different elemental dungeons.
- Tile C, including a wall option and room to grow and add your own tiles.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Elemental Dungeons Tiles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Earth, Fire, Air and Water - these elements are a staple in many RPG dungeons. Now you can bring the power of the elemental dungeon to your RPG Maker MV project with this fantastic new tileset pack.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
